title: Restarting randomly. Losing signal and WiFi signal
content:
Recently and suddenly my phone keeps restarting. It also has long periods of no signal. It either says H+ or when I go to check it it says Insert Sim. In my house it searches for WiFi constantly and can't find it. I have tried
Factory reset
Clearing unused apps and making more storage available
Installing the latest update
What can I do. It's driving me insane.
